DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Antibiotic Dosing Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects prospectively enrol Intraosseous Regional Administration ( IORA ) group , investigator use historical control Systemic Intravenous Administration ( SIA ) group , include match group patient 6 month prior enrollment . SIA group receive systemic dosing cefazolin within one hour incision , current standard care . IORA group receive intraosseous dose tourniquet inflate 300-350mm/Hg . Cefazolin 1 gram give intraosseous cannula , place medial aspect proximal tibia , drape skin incision . The cefazolin administer bolus 200 mL normal saline . Incision make immediately infusion . Subjects group receive routine care follow procedure . Primary outcome acute surgical site infection , define within 3 week surgical procedure . Secondary outcome include correlation clinical comorbidities primary outcome , report complication , compare surgery specific information ( tourniquet time , blood loss ) . Subjects penicillin allergy receive 200mg cefazolin test dose via systemic intravenous route , current standard care . If adverse reaction observe , investigator proceed administration 1g cefazolin via intraosseus route .
